website_summaries.verdict: The Chromebox 3 is built with 8th generation Intel Celeron processors to handle a full range of tasks from apps to education, with security built in.
pros: With its moderate price and excellent performance, this Chromebox is hard to beat
The Intel Celeron 3865U processor and 4GB DDR4 ram make for a machine that runs quickly and smoothly for streaming or browsing
32GB of storage on the SSD is more than enough for users who take advantage of Google's online storage
Access to the Play app store allows you to install the same apps as your Android phone
cons: Some customers reported issues with specific apps

customer_reviews.title: Works Like A Charm
customer_reviews.text: Has worked flawlessly. So much quicker than my Windows 10 Computer. I have a beast of a Windows 10 with 32 gig and 8T of hard drive and start the computer from an ssd, as well as a fast 8 core AMD and the chromebox is still much faster. Took me less than 10 minutes to have it up and running and configured. Signed in with the same user account as my chromebook and android tablet and had it updated with all my programs. Bought as a replacement for my backup computer and now I find I am using this more than my primary computer.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Plug in, sign in, start using
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, as expected. I love the simplicity, there’s nothing to set up no bloatware no bullsht, just plug in, sign in, and you’re set.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Small box with plenty of power for Home Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my 5+ year old streaming device. Set up was a breeze and love how user friendly chrome OS is. So far streaming netflix and browsing the internet is a piece of cake for this little computer. My wireless keyboard and mouse worked right away. This also comes with a mounting device so it can hide away nicely behind a wall mounted TV.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Garcia

customer_reviews.title: No Sound Out of HDMI
customer_reviews.text: I love this device, and I am a huge fan of the chromebox. Sadly, there is no sound coming out of the HDMI port. I tried powerwashing, resetting, and installing all upgrades. The BT works, the mics port works, but no sound out of the HDMI port. ASUS support suggests replacing it. Ill update the review if the issue is resolved with the new unit. Update. Replaced the device and it works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: acampolo

customer_reviews.title: Static or crackling during audio playback, unusable
customer_reviews.text: About 40% of the time there is loud static or crackling especially if I have 2 or more tabs open in chrome browser (only 1 tab playing audio). Closing and re-opening chrome browser fixes it but soon the static returns. Brand new chromebox with new gold plated HDMI cable. Tried different HDMI ports on TV and different HDMI cables. Edit: returned defective unit, replacement seems much better. Second edit after 2 months: audio stopped working. Must reboot each time and can have only 1 or 2 tabs open before audio stops working again. They need to fix the audio problems with this box. Unable to return now, past the 30 day return window.
customer_reviews.author: A. Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Removed Chrome OS and installed Lubuntu OS (Linux)
customer_reviews.text: I removed the Chrome operating system and installed Lubuntu OS with the help of MrChromebox firmware.With Lubuntu OS this is now a fully functional Linux computer.Due to privacy/censorship concerns I now avoid using computers with Windows,Mac or Chrome OS. I much prefer Linux now and installing Linux on a Chrome device like this is more difficult than installing on a Windows based PC. Lubuntu Linux works great on this machine but if you want Linux i would recommend buying a mini PC based on Windows and just erase Windows and install Linux or go with a bare bones mini PC that has no OS and install Linux.
customer_reviews.author: modalsystem

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of Cromeboxes (Chromebooks too)
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would dump the PC and run everything via Chrome. For boring day-to-day stuff on the net, can't go wrong with Chrome. Like having a real screen, keyboard, mouse, and ports. Quiet too. For "Real-PC" stuff I use Chrome's Remote Desktop to access a Win10 machine tucked away in another room. Most desk time is on the Chromebox. Travel time is with a 15" Chromebook. All pair nicely with Android phones and Google home devices.
customer_reviews.author: tpkidd3

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have an HP Slate 21 Pro. It's an all-in-one android pc with a touchscreen. HP abandoned it long ago at version 4.something. It was slow, and buggy. But, you can switch it to HDMI mode which lets you use it as a monitor. I slapped this thing to the back of it with some servo tape and connected it via HDMI and USB. The USB connection lets you still use the touch screen. No drivers required. It's fast with no lag, and the kids no longer complain about YouTube being slow or other problems like having to reboot regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Founders

customer_reviews.title: Gets it done. For less
customer_reviews.text: So , shopping for my 4th desktop in 13 years. Was time for change. Nothing against Windows. Just not happy with getting 4 years out of the hardware. Seems to sucome to dust. This chromebox on other hand. Has no fan. Energy efficient. With security updates til 2025. At half cost.. Hmmm. I'm in. Very happy with it. It does everything I need. And simple.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne14048

customer_reviews.title: Fast and basic but Google Drive problems and scrolling issues
customer_reviews.text: While faster than my Chrome Box 2 this Chrome Box 3 has issues writing to and reading from Google Drive, and will sometimes crash attempting to copy or paste documents or images, either to or from Google Drive, and often causes sync problems with changes to Google Drive made on my phone. It also has trouble scrolling through social media sites with multiple images or videos like Twitter and Instagram, and will jump back and forth as they load, or just completely jump past images. For now I've gone back to using my old Chrome Box 2, which does not have those issues.
customer_reviews.author: MitchellD

customer_reviews.title: Great little web browser.
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously fast boot up. It mounts to the back of the monitor so it doesn't take up any desk space. Streams video with no issues I've found. I have this attached to the back of a 36" curved 4k monitor with a wireless keyboard/mouse, and run the sound through some bluetooth speakers. As a web browsing/ video streaming machine it is impossible to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mom
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chromebox along with Asus VE278Q monitor for Mom. Setup was 10 minutes. Connected immediately to the internet via wifi. Logged into her account and all her settings from previous chromebook were intact. ChromeOS has come along way. This item is really great for older crowd that just needs to access the internet. After cleaning her Windows based PC one too many times in the past, I have not had an infiltration since switching to ChromeOS. Now if we can get faster processors/memory/disk space without the extremely high prices.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Has problem with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I had two major problems with this that forced me to return the unit. 1) When using a Bluetooth mouse websites would randomly prevent me from scrolling. This was a problem with the tab, not the website, so the only way to fix it was to copy the URL and paste into a new tab. 2) Audio would randomly cut out accompanied by loud digital beeps. This made using it as a media center impossible which was my main goal.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Chrome Box, fast and small.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for web browsing and email, nothing else. I knew going in that there would be limitations for things like available software such as you'd find in the Windows or iOS operating systems . . . but that's OK. I wanted something that I could sit down, turn on, and it would start and work every time . . . FAST. That's what I got! I used the included mounting kit to mount the box on the back of my monitor, makes for a nice clean install.
customer_reviews.author: MarineLifer

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible with webcams - useless for video conferencing
customer_reviews.text: This is useless for video conferencing. There is no ability to adjust the webcam's mic gain and it is set so low that even when other viewers set their volume at 100%, they can barely hear what you say. EXTREMELY frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Don Danger

customer_reviews.title: This Chromebox is better than a bloated Windows PC
customer_reviews.text: This device is awesome for web browsing and downloading apps from the Google App store. For everything else, I use a Windows PC. So I'm basically using this Chromebox 9 out of 10 times. Starts up in seconds (unlike Windows), don't need to login since my smartphone is used as a trusted device. I use a JBL Flip bluetooth speaker for sound and I'm good to go. I do recommend upgrading ram to 8gb. It was a bit sluggish with 4gb. I have used this device for a year and a half now and I will never go back to using my Windows PC daily. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Chromebox
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, most of what he does is internet browsing or YouTube watching. I got this prior to quarantine, but i am glad i had it. He was able to do all of his schoolwork on it without issues. This particular unit can have the memory upgraded, i plan on bumping the RAM up to 16GB.
customer_reviews.author: Mike - 5after12

customer_reviews.title: Does what it sets out for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this more than a year now. Have been using it without too much fanfare. Run Chrome perfectly. Now with school and work are being virtual, try to find a Chromebook is almost impossible for less than $500. Hook this little box into a 24-in plus monitor and you have the perfect work or school compare to the tiny 11-in with the Chromebook. Plus, Ethernet port is available for hard wire connection to the internet, no drop off wi-fi to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Fair reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your money. Fast and just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my senior citizen mother. Setup was easy and she is very happy. Speedy with no lag, it found her printer with an extension to chrome, and the footprint is tiny. I might order one for myself it was so good. Awesome value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Basile

customer_reviews.title: Died after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chrome box in July. I use it mainly for google drive and google photos. I loved the quickness and reliability of the computer...until 10 months later when I was in the middle of a google document and it completely died. Luckily it is still under warranty and I am hoping I perhaps just got a dud. Hopefully I will get a replacement soon, and can write a much better review.
customer_reviews.author: Lavon

customer_reviews.title: Small and faster
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is solid. It even includes a brackets making any monitor an AIO. Chrome OS is mindlessly simple and very fast... better than Windows if you only do light office work and home entertaining. Despite the goodies, I returned it because: (1) the USB-C did not work with my lenovo USB-C QHD monitor (it should but didn't); (2) Chrome OS currently does not support MS OneNote which I rely on everyday. Will definitely try the next version of the Chromebox hopefully all these issues have been addressed that time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install arrive on time
customer_reviews.text: Wife love it. We need just something to do some browsing and Crome is great for that. For those who wants to do more with this Have in mind this IS NOT A computer is more like a browser there isn’t much you can do with. Wife live it since is fast. Will buy again for a gift
customer_reviews.author: navieh

customer_reviews.title: Made kids happy
customer_reviews.text: This is the same type software that my grand kids use at school. I modified the mounting bracket by over size drilling the mounting holes and attached the unit to the back of a 32" smart tv. Great picture. Kids now fight over it. No complaints. Had everything up and working in two hours, most of which were setting up the new tv reading all the legal stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but is more of a robust version of a tablet than workstation
customer_reviews.text: We have never used a Chromebox before. We have Google products and we were used to the Google os environment. Integrated well with our setup. Easy to setup. There a few caveats to the Chromebox. It functions more like a phone or tablet rather than a computer. Programs are apps installed via play store for example, which is fine for our use. Only thing that we have not been able to figure out using a headset. No audio jack and our wireless headsets have not worked. Otherwise, it is affordable and meets/exceeds our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Man

customer_reviews.title: Great if all you need is Chrome
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and only need a solid browser. I did my first shift with this last night and was very pleased. It was super fast to set up, easily populated my existing Chrome accounts and associated information and links. Startup is so fast, no waiting for Windows to start up, no lagging. While it's a bit expensive for basically a chromebook you have to add a monitor to, it is exactly perfect for my job
customer_reviews.author: Julie Graves

customer_reviews.title: Audio Sucks
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because it is rated as one of the best. Every turn has been a struggle. Now I am finally realizing the audio can not be fixed. I have a hdmi monitor, the audio drags on websites and apps. I need this for audio/video conferences and its useless. I purchased every name brand accessories, Yeti mic, LG monitor
customer_reviews.author: natasha royston

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE:  NO LONGER USABLE! FULL SCREEN VIDEO NO LONGER SMOOTH!
customer_reviews.text: Full Screen Video Choppy & Skips / Unusable! We own approx. 5 of these units for my business as video slideshow players, and I previously wrote a great review. But, suddenly an update or something has rendered them useless. I'm a technical engineer & I've tried to troubleshoot everything possible that can be done. But, unfortunately they can't even play video smoothly. Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Chromebox as a nice family desktop!
customer_reviews.text: Chrome OS is simple to use! I got it for my in-laws in Montenegro so that wouldn't need to worry about keeping their computers updated and relying on more tech savvy people. The base model is more than sufficient to check YouTube, read the news, and video chat (bought a USB webcam) with my wife in the US. Hopefully ,it remains a good family desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Andhi T.

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a chromebook that reached the end of its life, and 30 days in I'm really happy with it. Works well with my USB wireless keyboard/mouse and with my bluetooth earbuds/mic. Would recommend to a friend or family member in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: SLG521

customer_reviews.title: For those who might try to purchase for digital signage.
customer_reviews.text: Google requires you to have an enterprise account or a single Kiosk license to run these in Kiosk mode. The units worked great! Especially as Digital Sign Kiosks. I ran into an issue with getting them into Kiosk mode but that was not fault of the unit. That was me. User error. Thus 5 start still. I just wish I knew this going into it. An outside company said these are what we need. mentioned nothing about the google enterprise account and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hines

customer_reviews.title: I kicked the Windows habit!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my Windows 7 computer and decided to go to the Chrome operating system. It's been relatively seamless so far. Fastest booting imaginable and the performance is much faster and simpler than any Windows computer I've ever seen. Much less cost also.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M. Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: I think I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what I expected, but I have to say this thing is really impressive. I bought the base model, half expecting it’d be slow. It’s not. I know about the limitations of ChromeOS and what the limitations are aren’t ASUS’s fault, so can’t be mad there. This little box is inexpensive, sets up easily, and works beautifully. I think I kinda love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry V. Lubov

customer_reviews.title: no cd or dvd platform
customer_reviews.text: What you gain in compactness you give up in peripherals. I like the idea that my data are in the Google cloud rather than sitting on a hard drive in my PC. I was originally given a chromebox as a gift to replace my dying PC and then support was withdrawn from that model and I bought this Chromebox 3.
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Very quick
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a little over a week but so far it's a very nice product. Quick to load. Accepted a wireless Logitech 545 very easy. Graphics are very nice. Easy step by step setup.
customer_reviews.author: MattR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup to replace earlier Chromebox
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Asus to replace an older Chromebox that had reached EOL. After connecting power, mouse, keyboard, and HDMI monitor I logged into my account and was pleased to have previous bookmarks and documents ready to go with no effort at all. I would recommend the Asus to a friend. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Cannot play DVD movies
customer_reviews.text: Chromebox is great for kids. Takes up less space, is very fast. However two main issues: 1. Won't play movies on an external DVD player. 2. Won't work with my TV (even though it works with a 4K monitor). I feel like a mini-pc would have been a better choice at this point.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Small and fast
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to connect to my big screen tv for browsing the internet, watching tv online, and simple office work. Works great. Highly recommend upgrading the ram to 8gb.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great for people that don't understand technology
customer_reviews.text: My parents are worse than tech illiterate and this is easy for them to use. As there automatic tech support I love this. Auto updates and I don't have even a quarter of the calls that I had when they had a windows machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jer Over

customer_reviews.title: Works great ... most of the time
customer_reviews.text: It's fast, but not fast enough to stream live television. I have to go back to my Mac for that. Ocassionally have a DNS problem which hasn't yet been resolved. Other than that ... I love chromeboxes. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: George Boase

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great replacement for my old Chromebox. I was able to just literally plug it in and everything was there. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylo

customer_reviews.title: Warranty repair was free, but not very timply and I still do not know if it has been fixed.
customer_reviews.text: It was defective. Quit working in one day. Had to send for repair. Still waiting for it to come back.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Forget an old school PC, this is the future
customer_reviews.text: If you like computers that are instantly outdated and virus ridden, don’t buy this. If you are looking for a great, fast, and compact computer click checkout now. Great speed, quality, and performance. 4K no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ibuytoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great basic computing This is a replacement for an older model that is no longer getting updates. 1st one was totally noiseless, this model has a slight hum.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bouthillette

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed mount
customer_reviews.text: We bought an older N62 from Asus, and it came with a quality looking mount. This one is just a stamped metal bracket. Still a good machine a bit larger than expected but works well and play store still very limited on apps selection.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great great machine but it took a long time just to find the on switch I mean it was really difficult on the corner
customer_reviews.author: m.s.h.

customer_reviews.title: audio problems
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it but i had problems with it no playing audio. I would have to reboot it for it to work
customer_reviews.author: airman56

customer_reviews.title: ASUS CHROMEBOX 3-N017U Mini PC
customer_reviews.text: Very good mini pc so far. Boots very fast. Plays, streams internet videos fast and smooth. Very quiet. Only thing would like the date and time to show together. Great powerful little pc for our needs. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Asus chromebox and I'm loving it. I upgraded the RAM to 8 gb for a speedier functionality. I haven't found any CONS in the 6 months I have owned it.
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Morelos

customer_reviews.title: Did everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Powerhouse little box, perfect for a no nonsense desktop solution. Android apps, quick loading , plenty of power for the os. Mounting bracket included for a clean install.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Small, quiet, and it just works.
customer_reviews.text: Solid little unit. Was very easy to setup other than network printing. I switched my HP OfficeJet over to USB rather than ethernet connection.
customer_reviews.author: E. F. K.

customer_reviews.title: Fast little mini computer
customer_reviews.text: Fast little versatile unit. I've only tied USB storage and a keyboard/mouse to it, but all has been no issues. I run 2 monitors off it.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: My 83 year old mom needed a new computer. We bought this instead because all she does is surf the net. Really great chrome device, super cheap, fast as my triple the cost Chrome book.
customer_reviews.author: Byrne Booth Family

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: This awesome device for home office. Small, portable, very ver quiet and great response time which can work great with 4K monitor
customer_reviews.author: Medhi

customer_reviews.title: This meets our needs!
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I are not very techno savvy but this is workable for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Warr

customer_reviews.title: OK google
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit just fine but so far I have not been able to get OK google to work. Does anyone know if a HDMI microphone will solve the problem?
customer_reviews.author: Craig W.

customer_reviews.title: Chrome OS-desktop computer
customer_reviews.text: It replaces a windows 7 desktop. It is very compact, fast and good deal for price.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Great value and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father. Perfect for those who need email, web browsing and to function within the google eco system (which is getting more robust by the moment).
customer_reviews.author: Norman Powers

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: If you want a small (mounted behind monitor) unit for basic internet, videos, this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Erich von Manstein

customer_reviews.title: Love the chromebox
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I ordered this. Computers are more pricey, but, the chrome box is perfect for me. Surfing the web, listening to music, social media, playing games, it's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lazaro Borges

customer_reviews.title: Great compact pc
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with..one tech question I have not had time to ask so if a tech could follow up great! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: selecteurocars

customer_reviews.title: best purchase I've made in awhile
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I need and more. Was easy to set up. So far, nothing but good things to say.
customer_reviews.author: pamela l.

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to PC and Apple...
customer_reviews.text: Using this for basic office functions. It works incredibly well.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas O.

customer_reviews.title: love chrome, i have two chrome books and now ...
customer_reviews.text: love chrome ,i have two chrome books and now a chromebox life is good
customer_reviews.author: jim bryant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for digital Signage
customer_reviews.text: We use the Asus Chrombox's for digital signage. They work great and combined with Google management we have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D Dlugose

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performance, Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Had first generation Asus Chromebox and it could do all I needed, but wanted bluetooth sound synced with video. This Asus can do everything I need and want at a fantastically low price.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Netflix and Google Play Movies and TV Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Despite the Netflix app not working, overall I do love this device. I just got over getting upset that the Netflix app doesn't work and realized...that overall this is a good device. UPDATE: The Google Play Movies and TV app also doesn't work. Same issue as the Netflix App. Editing this down to 2 stars until they fix it. Fingerpointing between Google and Asus. Google says Asus needs to come up with a fix. Asus just says "Why don't you use the Chrome version of the app?" My answer was "Why did I bother buying the Chromebox 3 then?"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult for us
customer_reviews.text: I suppose this would be great for someone who understands today's technology. But for it was far more than we could deal with when we found that it wouldn't connect with our older monitor that still works great and the only way to print was by emailing the file to our printer. Adapters, New devices, and more than we could deal with. Returned the system and bought a computer that will use my existing hard drive and devices.
customer_reviews.author: Bartly

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Nice Device
customer_reviews.text: Nice device, if the memory is updagrded to 8gb it would have been amazing as most of my online activities require good memory. Even with 4 GB the performance is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rama

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft doesn’t work on chromeOS
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this because I purchased it to play Minecraft on, and Minecraft is not supported on chromeOS
customer_reviews.author: Justin Vawter

product_meta.title: ASUS CHROMEBOX 3-N017U Mini PC with Intel Celeron, 4K UHD Graphics and Power Over Type C Port, Star Gray
product_meta.description: Style:CeleronPowered by Intel Celeron processors, the ASUS Chrome box 3 delivers a perfect balance of desktop performance with the latest in connectivity options. Use your favorite Google play apps across platforms and on multiple displays with DisplayPort over powered Type C. Stream your favorite content over Gigabit LAN or 802.11AC Wi-Fi. Card Reader - 3 -in-1:Micro SD/Micro SDXC/Micro SDHC
feature_bullets: CHROMEBOX 3-N017U features an Intel Celeron 3865U Processor with 4GB DDR4 Memory, Gigabit LAN, 802.11AC Wi-Fi and 32GB M.2 SATA SSD
Full support of Android apps from Google Play on chrome OS
Integrated Intel 4K UHD graphics supports 2x monitors using HDMI and DisplayPort over Type C for compatibility with legacy display connections like VGA and DVI
Share files or stream your favorite media with Intel 802.11AC Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.2, and USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type A & Type C ports
Power over Type C minimizes cable clutter and delivers power to monitors, projectors, and mobile devices

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars299 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
